description: ff. 106. 212 x 146; 164 x 83 mm. 23 lin. On fol. 1a note by ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh Köprülüzāde (d. 1146/1733), for whom this copy was made in Damascus, Jumādá I, 1129. Musalsalāt: Brockelmann, GAL, II, 505 (no. 4). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الاول الجامع بدىع السموات
author: Kūrānī, Ibrāhīm ibn ḥasan, 1616 or 17-ca. 1690

title.@value: Masālik al-abrār ilá aḥādīth al-Nabī al-mukhtār.
